Cube: s release of a multi-faceted plan called the "Contract with Black America" (CWBA) outlining his ideas to close the wealth gap between Black and white Americans.
Ken Kurson: who knows Cube's business partner and is friends with White House Senior Adviser Jared Kushner, sent Kushner a text message suggesting a relationship with Cube "could be a plus for the White House."
The Trump campaign: s weekslong courtship of Cube and his team, including invitations to the White House and phone calls.
The three: hour meeting near the White House between Cube, Kushner, and other senior advisers to Trump.
